Key.Original: Unload Vehicle Cargo to Ammobox
Unload Ammobox to Vehicle Cargo
Return all gear to Arsenal
Our informants have reported that a %4 officer is inspecting %1. Now is the time to Strike! Make sure he is eliminated by any means possible before %2:%3.

Reports have come in that a %4 SpecOps ground team is currently patrolling near %1. From what we know, these are tough soldiers who usually make use of airial un-manned drones. A well executed strike will gain us some of their high tech equipment. Do this before %2:%3.

Bad news, one of our very own is planning to defect. We have tracked his movements to the nearby town of %1. We are not taking any chancs. Kill him before he provides the enemy with intel of the location of our soldiers homes and FIA cash stockpiles. Do this before %2:%3. We don't where exactly this meeting will happen. You will recognise the building by the nearby MRAP and %4 presence.

%1 and %2 know the location of our HQ. We suspect that they have sent a SpecOps Air Squad and a land attack in order to kill Petros. We have two choices - Either retreat and move HQ further than 500m away, or defend with all we have.

A CSAT %1 is disturbing our operations in the area. This heavily defended outpost has Mortar and UAV, from what our spies tell us. We advise the destruction of the Drone before engaging and elimination the majority of ground troops. If there is an AA tank, this is also a priorty target. The operation must be completed before %2:%3.

A %1 has a monopoly over the power supply to nearby towns. Nato might not like this, but we have no choice- We need the Towns on our side and to achieve this we will need the Powerplant. Capture it before %2:%3.

An ammo convoy is departing from <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> to <marker name='%4'>%3</marker>. Try to intercept it. Steal or destroy that truck before it reaches it's destination. Be careful, the enemy may provide an armoured escort. The convoy leaves <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> in 10 minutes which is at %5:%6.

A fuel convoy is departing from <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> to <marker name='%4'>%3</marker>. Try to intercept it. Steal or destroy that truck before it reaches it's destination. Be careful, the enemy may provide an armoured escort. The convoy leaves <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> in 10 minutes which is at %5:%6.

An armor convoy is departing from <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> to <marker name='%4'>%3</marker>. Try to intercept it. Destroy the main vehicle before it reaches it's destination.The convoy leaves <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> in 10 minutes which is at %5:%6.

A POW convoy is departing from <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> to <marker name='%4'>%3</marker>. Sadly, it seems the enemy are planning their execution. We must intercept it and rescue them. Kill the driver or capture the truck to make them join you and bring them to HQ.The convoy leaves <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> in 10 minutes which is at %5:%6.

A money convoy is departing from <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> to <marker name='%4'>%3</marker>. Steal that truck and bring it to HQ. There aren't many better opportunities to acquire the funds we will need to build up our army, don't screw up! The convoy leaves <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> in 10 minutes which is at %5:%6.

A supply convoy is departing from <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> to <marker name='%4'>%3</marker>. Steal the truck and bring it to %4. Let the people there know of the FIA's 'benevolence'.The convoy leaves <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> in 10 minutes which is at %5:%6.

A convoy with a high valuable target is departing from <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> to <marker name='%4'>%3</marker>. Seize the opportunity and take him out! We believe he will use a decoy to obscure his exact vehicle. The convoy leaves <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> in 10 minutes which is at %5:%6.
A QRF has just been spotted taking off from %2. Their initial heading suggests that %1 is their target. We have no choice, assume defensive positions

An opportunity to strike a Radio Tower in %1 presents its self. If we manage this it will interrupt %4 Comms Nework in the AO. We can destroy the antenna or capture the outpost but must complete it before %5:%6.
We have downed air vehicle. This is a great chance to destroy it before it is recovered by a recovery team from %1 reaches the crash site
We know an %4 is stationed in %1. This is a good chance to steal or destroy it before it causes more damage. Do it before %2:%3.

Black Market dealer Devin Connell has been spotted near %1. He's scheduled for a flight to Metavira or Arulco at %2:%3, so you better hurry up if you wish to acquire some of his fine products. From our recent meetings with him, he has agreed to meet with FIA overt soldiers only, apparently he doesnt like civilians all that much.
We've spotted an enemy ammo truck around %1. This is a great opportunity to scavange some well-needed gear from the enemy. We have time until %2:%3.
We've spotted an enemy fuel truck around %1. This is a great opportunity to obtain plenty from the enemy. We have time until %2:%3.

We know %5 is guarding a large amount of money in the bank of <marker name='%2'>%1</marker>. Take this getaway vehicle and go there before %3:%4, hold the truck close to thw bank's main entrance for 2 minutes and the money will be transferred to the truck. Bring it back to HQ and the money will be ours.

We've had word from our informant that a sympathetic cell has sent supplies to <marker name='%2'>%1</marker>. They ran into a patrol and had to abandon the truck. Find and secure the vehicle, then deliver the supplies to the people in <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> before %5:%6. %7 command has probably dispatched a patrol from <marker name='%4'>%3</marker> to retrieve the goods, so you better hurry.

<marker name='%2'>%1</marker> population is in need of supplies. As it happens, we have just what they need and it may improve our relationship with them. I reserved a transport truck with supplies near our HQ. Drive the transport truck to <marker name='%2'>%1</marker> city center. Hold it there for 2 minutes before %3:%4.

We have noticed that the town of %1 is sympathetic to our cause. Travel there with this Truck and establish a semi-permanent propaganda station in order to spread the word. Once established, stay with and guard the station for as long as you deem necessary to raise town support. It would be wise to expect a number of enemy military responses to this action. You have until %2:%3 to arrive and set it up.

Supporters of our cause have been working hard to bring the population of %1 over to our side. Help these brave volunteers by delivering these leaflets to safe drop locations. Pick up will take place at %2:%3, so you better have them in place by then. This might be easier if you manage to remain undetected for as long as possible.
You failed to provide leaflets for our volunteers in %1.
Drop a crate within 20m of the marked position, do this before %2:%3.
Well done. Our volunteers in %1 are now spreading the word.

%4 is rebuilding a radio tower in %1. If we want to keep up the enemy comms breakdown, the work must be stopped. Destroy the repair truck parked nearby or capture the zone. Work will be finished at %2:%3.

A group of POWs is awaiting execution at %1. We must rescue them before %2:%3 and bring them to HQ. It would be wise to avoid using anything explosive in your rescue attempt for fear of collateral damage.
A group of FIA supportes are hidden in a house in %1. We have to get there and find them before %2 does and bring them back to base.

International press reports that high casualties suffered by the %1 has had impact in their fighting ability. Lots of veteran soldiers have been replaced with new recruits with only minimal training. This can be seen in their overall skill and competence.

International press reports: "The tensions in %1 have escalated into armed conflict. The first casualty of the skirmish belongs to the %2. It is confirmed that the perpetrator was member of %3. The accident has caused the %4 to mobilize it's armed forces near the %1 area. %5, which is a known supporter of the %6, is aware of the incident put there are no reports of any %7 military activities in the area. The conflict is expected to escalate into multiple skirmishes around the area. Global media slowly shifts it's attention to the developing hot zone."

International press reports: "The tensions in %1 have escalated into armed conflict. The first casualty of the skirmish belongs to the %2. It is confirmed that the perpetrator was member of the %3. The accident has caught the attention of %4, a well known ally to the %5. The %6 has stated it will increase it's material support to the area. There are no reports of %8s known supporter %7 taking active measures in the area. The conflict is expected to escalate into multiple skirmishes around the area. Global media slowly shifts it's attention to the developing hot zone."

International press reports: "The tensions in %1 have escalated into armed conflict. The first casualty belongs to the small group resisting %2 occupation called %3. It is now confirmed that %4 was the perpetrator and the incident has turned sympathies towards the %5. %6 has publicly sent their condolences to the %5 and promises to support them in form of supplies and military equipment. The incident will most probably cause further military conflict in the area and number of the number casualties is expected to rise"
Local press reports that citizens in %1 are worried about %2 presence in their city. They're obviously not pleased with the %3 unable to handle the situation.
Local population in %1 is worried about %2 presence in their city. They're discontent with our ability to handle the situation.
